mapper.select: SELECT community_name AS community, ROUND(SUM(unit_price)/ COUNT(*), 2) AS average_unit_price, ROUND(SUM(total_price)/ COUNT(*), 2) AS average_total_price, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM t_lianjia_house WHERE district = #{district} GROUP BY community_name ORDER BY total_count DESC LIMIT #{statisticsCount}
